pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:0.6: Ime kho panāyyāyo sekhiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:1.16: Yā anādariyaṃ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambentī nivāseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karonti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā, tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.1.8: Atha kho bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.1.12: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karontī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.1.15: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.1.17: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.1.18: “Na udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.1.19: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena gilānā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṃ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.2.3: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānāya bhikkhuniyā udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.2.4: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.2.5: “Na udake agilānā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.2.6: Na udake agilānāya uccāro vā passāvo vā kheḷo vā kātabbo.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:75.2.7: Yā anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake agilānā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
